response_headers.Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

requests.curl:
curl "https://www.example.com/api/storefront/checkouts/838AA2936F" -d '{"email":"susanb@workarea.com","shipping_address":{"first_name":"Susan","last_name":"Baker","street":"350 Fifth Avenue","city":"New York","region":"NY","country":"US","postal_code":"10118","phone_number":"6465552390"},"billing_address":{"first_name":"Susan","last_name":"Baker","street":"350 Fifth Avenue","city":"New York","region":"NY","country":"US","postal_code":"10118","phone_number":"6465552390"},"shipping_service":"Express"}' -X PATCH \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json"

explanation:
Use this endpoint to make updates to checkout. This will typically
mean setting addresses and shipping options for the checkout.
